name: reach
chn: vt. & vi. 够得着; 抵达; 实现; 达到
example_en: She reached out her hand to touch the stars.
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语'ræcan'，意为'伸出'。联想记忆：想象一个人伸出手去够一个高处的物品，这个动作就是'reach'。图像记忆：画一个人站在梯子上，伸手去够树上的苹果。

image_prompt.main_image: A person standing on a ladder, reaching out to pick an apple from a tall tree. The scene is set in a sunny orchard with green grass and a clear blue sky.
image_prompt.example_image: A young girl standing on a hill at night, reaching her hand towards the sky filled with bright stars. The scene captures her wonder and the vastness of the night sky.
